abstract.t: This document defines a new Dynamic Host Configuration Protocol (DHCP)option that is passed from the DHCP Server to the DHCP Client todefine which QoS mechanism and the specific classification settingsto be used by the host in its IP datagram forwarding field. This document describes the option support for IP datagram network layerQoS mechanisms. This option does have the ability to support datalink layer QoS mechanisms if so defined in future updates of thisdocument.
